entry.title: Summer School ASAI-ER Bertinoro
entry.content:
Today, Giulia concluded the Advanced School in Artificial Intelligence located in Bertinoro (FC)!

The School lasted two weeks and the lessons where held in the beautiful Centro Residenziale Universitario Ce.U.B of Bertinoro. The lessons provided an immersive dive into the world of Artificial Intelligence, encompassing everything from foundational mathematical concepts to cutting-edge trends. The program also featured interactive lab sessions, allowing students to collaborate on coding challenges.

“Engaging with fellow students during the lab sessions was particularly rewarding: we had the opportunity to work together and share our ideas, mixing up the knowledge from our heterogeneous backgrounds. These hands-on activities truly enriched my learning experience and being in such a beautiful environment was a precious bonus”
entry.summary: Today, Giulia concluded the Advanced School in Artificial Intelligence located in Bertinoro (FC)!

entry.title: Graduation
entry.content: Today is a big day for Giulia! She graduated with a master’s degree in Biomedical Engineering at the University of Bologna, in Cesena Campus!
entry.summary: Today is a big day for Giulia! She graduated with a master’s degree in Biomedical Engineering at the University of Bologna, in Cesena Campus!

entry.title: PhD position
entry.content: Today, 1st March 2023, Andrea Espis will join our research Group! Welcome Andrea!
entry.summary: Today, 1st March 2023, Andrea Espis will join our research Group! Welcome Andrea!

entry.title: INFN Hackathon
entry.content: Today, Riccardo and Matteo will join the Third ML-INFN Hackathon: Advanced Level located in Bari! During these days they will also visit ReCas DataCenter near the Physics Department in Bari
